speak;Neimi;Grandfather would take me to the hills at dawn...|*sniff*|We'd shoot until my fingers blistered, but...|When I hit the target, his proud smile made it worthwhile.
speak;Innes;Sentiment has no place in warfare...|But perhaps it serves as motivation.
speak;Neimi;What about you, Prince Innes?|I've heard stories about your legendary accuracy.
speak;Innes;Legends are often exaggerated.|But my dedication to the craft is not.
speak;Neimi;I wish I could watch you shoot sometime...|To learn, I mean!|Oh no, that sounded presumptuous. I'm sorry!
